metadataAttributes.id: MON-01.1 - Intrusion Detection & Prevention Systems (IDS & IPS)
metadataAttributes.title: MON-01.1 - Intrusion Detection & Prevention Systems (IDS & IPS)
metadataAttributes.summary: Mechanisms exist to implement Intrusion Detection / Prevention Systems (IDS / IPS) technologies on critical systems, key network segments and network choke points.
